Description:
Sublime Living In Quiet Court Setting
The Feel:
A delight to the senses, this home embodies idyllic storybook charm. From the enchanting Wisteria-entwined entry, to the picturesque pool-side garden setting, this character-filled weatherboard home exudes a calming ambience in a private hideaway setting. Kitchen, dining & living with a turquoise pool backdrop extends the desirability of year-round outdoor living, with curated gardens & a colour palette to soothe & inspire. Set on a large block in a secluded court locale with completely private outdoor living, the rural outlook offers a stunning vista & shelter from southerly winds.
The Facts:
-Flooded with natural light & glazing that embraces garden views at every turn
-Kitchen, dining, living with timber flooring looks over the pool & terraced entertaining areas
-9x3.5m salt-chlorinated, solar-heated, self-cleaning pool is the focal point
-Merbau deck & sandstone surrounds the pool, with shady pavilions creating an outdoor room
-Suntrap private rear garden attracts northern sun path, shielded by southerly winds
-Enchanting Wisteria entry, thru RC double gates, creates idyllic storybook charm
-Zoned north facing living with gas log fire overlooks veranda to white peach, apple & hibiscus trees
-Climate comfort with gas-fired log heater, ducted heating, 2 SSACs & ceiling fans to all rooms
-Kitchen with Westinghouse electric oven, Whirlpool induction cooktop & Bosch DW
-Well-appointed master suite w/ SSAC, WIR & outlook beyond veranda to colourful citrus garden
-Renovated en-suite w/ rain shower, twin vanity & Moroccan design porcelain tiles
-2 more bedrooms with BIRs & ceiling fans flow to the open plan living area
-Refreshed main bathroom with large shower, bath & convenient separate WC
-New taps, fixtures & toilets to both BAs, all new lighting plan, freshly painted inside & out
-7 panel solar power
-Thriving, curated garden with productive fruit trees & vegie beds + hedges of salvia, mexican orange blossom, lavender & westringia
-Harvest lemon balm, thyme & sage from your own Tea Garden; rainwater tank to feed the garden
-Southern boundary cypress belt provides optimal privacy, with treed no-neighbour views
-Oversized DLUG caters to all needs + fully lined & lit attic storage. Additional garden shed
-Large block (app: 719m2) allows for at least 6 cars OSP (secure parking for trailer/caravan/boat)
-No thru traffic with links to pathways & walking tracks onwards to parklands, schools, shops & river
Owner Loves.
It is really homely, with such a relaxing ambience. We find ourselves using all parts of the block throughout the days and seasons, with dedicated spaces amongst the gardens & pool area to chase the sun from morning to night.

Description:
Move Straight in!
Stylishly updated this fantastic 4 bedroom family home is set on a desirable 695m2 (approx) corner block. Recently renovated and ready to move straight into is this solid brick Grovedale home. This is a rare opportunity to secure a home in this ever popular pocket of Grovedale.
Features:
695Sqm (approx.) corner allotment
4 bedrooms, the master is complete with walk in robe and ensuite.
Semi-open plan living, kitchen and dinina area
Kitchen with large walk in pantry
Living room with additional study nook
Central bathroom with seperate toilet
Fantastic outdoor entertaining area with built in brick BBQ
Extra large double lock up garage
Ducted heating, SS heating and cooling and ceiling fans throughout.
External security shutters
For the investor, a return in the vicinity of $400-$420pw
Only minutes away from Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre and within proximity to Deakin University, Epworth Hospital and the Leisurelink Aquatic Centre, it's no wonder Grovedale is popular with families who relish in the wide range of amenities available nearby. The easy accessibility to the Geelong Ring Road makes it a breeze to commute to Melbourne for work or head out to the coast on weekends. With all the big-ticket items recently updated, there's nothing left to do but move in and relax. Inspect without delay!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Premium single level living with panoramic views
All inspections welcome via private viewing. Please contact agent to arrange an inspection.
Ideal for those who seek the simplicity of single-level living and the ability to walk to conveniences, this pristine custom built home is ideal. What sets this home apart is that it boasts arguably the best views of any single level residence in Highton. A prime corner position in the street, a unique northern aspect and views from almost every room, without the complication of stairs. Boasting a timeless style and range of upgrades rarely found in builds today such as ornate cornicing, high timber doors, timber skirting and vaulted ceiling. There is also stunning outdoor paved and decked areas for entertaining, a separate workshop for the enthusiast and beautifully landscaped yard, ideal for pottering in the garden. Homes boasting such distinct features are rare. Don't miss this opportunity.
- Northern Aspect, incredible views from the living/kitchen and Master
- Two living areas, Three bed plus office/4th bedroom (with robes),
- Vaulted high ceilings, High Doors, Plantation shutters, Pelmet blinds
- Good sized lawn area for kids to play
- Outdoor undercover BBQ hub/bar, ideal for entertaining
- Kitchen: Stone tops, semi-integrated dishwasher, large oven, butler's pantry
- Split system aircon, Central heating/Evaporative cooling, Gas log fire
- Wrap around spotted gum deck with north/east views and outdoor blinds
- Garage with epoxy floor, separate workshop, CCTV, Zoned security
- Skylights and plumbed filter water tap
Insights: 24-26 Morena Street, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2012 and 108 other 4 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
GREAT FAMILY HOME IN A FANTASTIC LOCATION!!
Here is your chance to secure an eye-catching and spacious two-storey coastal entertainer situated in a quiet location with space, style, and low maintenance living.
The upper level consists of 4 bedrooms, master with en-suite including twin basins and WIR, whilst the remaining bedrooms have BIR's, centrally located family bathroom and fourth living area with two balconies. The lower level combines the main living spaces including the contemporary kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and 900mm cooktop and oven is complimented by the spacious open plan dining and living area opening onto a private, decked and very spacious alfresco entertaining area, spa and dedicated fire pit zone. Featuring on this level is the theatre room located at the front of the home along with another separate lounge room, plenty of spaces for the family to unwind.
Featuring, timber floors, ducted heating, ceiling fans throughout, solar panels, solar heating, ducted heating, water tank, 2 x sheds, side access for boat or caravan, extra-long double lock up garage with internal access through the generous sized laundry including stone bench tops, powder room, under stair storage and freshly painted throughout, all this and more on a private 650m2 allotment with low-maintenance well established gardens. What a fantastic opportunity to secure a quality family home or investment property in a magnificent location. Only a short stroll to parks and playgrounds, minutes to The Dunes shopping complex, medical facilities, Surf Coast Secondary College, Torquay Coast primary school and childcare centre. Arrange your inspection of this coastal entertainer today!!

Description:
High Calibre Liveability
PRIVATE INSPECTION OR VIRTUAL TOUR WELCOME
When award-winning design meets high calibre liveability the result is a home that feels so right.
With supreme family functionality with versatility and ease of living, this 3 bedroom quality home was built in 2017 by "Great Ocean Homes" most well regarded Award-winning builders.
Features here include a north facing light filled open plan living zone with a sleek well-planned kitchen and effortless connection to outdoor living; making this is a home for relaxed and easy entertaining. A second separate living zone, with a dedicated study nook, overlooks a sheltered courtyard deck and provides the perfect spot for some quiet down time or as a media room.
The master suite enjoys a touch of subtle luxury with plantation shutters, plush wool carpets, a spacious en-suite and an extensive walk-in robe. Two additional bedrooms (with built in robes) share a central bathroom. A powder room, large laundry and double garage complete the floor plan.
The contemporary monochromatic decor throughout is complemented with warm timber accents and leafy garden foliage glimpsed through strategically placed glazing. Built to harness passive climate control, the home is warm and inviting throughout and boasts a 6.5-star energy rating.
Ideal family home, or the retiree looking for a single level home conveniently located close to The Dunes Village, Surfcoast Secondary College and with beaches nearby too, this is a unique and inspiring home that welcomes you in to live outside the usual square.

Description:
Potential packed family home in booming Belmont (709m2 block)
Sold via Open Negotiation.
Big on space and potential in booming Belmont, close to schools, parkland with walking/bike tracks along Waurn Ponds Creek & Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, you'll love living here. The substantial home offers 4 bedrooms (3 with robes), lounge/dining, central kitchen with good bench space and storage opening to meals family area and north facing deck/patio area. The large rumpus room at the rear adjoins the 2 back bedrooms and opens to its own large rear deck. There's a double lock up garage and established gardens offering excellent privacy on the 709m2 allotment. Currently leased at $430pw until late Jan 2021, with the option of extending or vacant possession upon the correct notice given. This home is a blank canvas awaiting your touch and with a home this size it offers the excellent future growth. Call today for inspection details.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Levelled & Retained - Ready For You!
This outstanding allotment has been professionally cut and meticulously retained, ready and awaiting your dream home to come to life in this highly desirable, elevated location. Facing West with a lengthy 46m North facing boundary, this 918m2 (approx) allotment would be the ideal site to build either a single or double storey residence to capture the beautiful views of the rolling hills and Golden Plains in the distance.
Surrounded by quality substantial homes ensuring future growth and located a short distance from the Barrabool Hills Plaza, home to the local doctor & dentist, BWS & Woolworths, a selection of family fast food favourites plus a 24/7 Anytime Fitness Gymnasium.
Having had the uncertainty of site works/costs and delays taken out of the equation, this is sure to excite anyone looking to secure a substantial slice of Highton Ridge, at an affordable price!

Description:
3.5 acres of Bliss on the Bellarine
Set upon approx. 3.5 acres, this property offers sensational family living in an idyllic rural setting! Showcasing beautifully updated interiors, a spacious outdoor entertaining zone with spa, and an expansive 5-car work shed, every inch of this property will delight!
Rarely do you get to experience the perks of rural living, while still being close to lifes conveniences. A short drive will find you at Lake Connewarre or in the bustling hub of Leopold, which is home to the Gateway Plaza and Leopold P.S. A selection of the finest wineries are virtually on your doorstep, as well as the popular Flying Brick Cider Co. The Bellarine Highway grants easy access to Adventure Park and the scenic Bellarine Peninsula.
With recent updates including freshly painted interiors and new carpet, plus a brand new en suite to the Master Bedroom, youll love that you can move straight in without having to lift a finger. Complete with built-in cabinetry, the lounge provides a generous retreat for relaxation. The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone features a wall of north-facing windows, which maximises the natural light and captures the surrounding gardens. The kitchen takes care of all your cooking needs with a built-in pantry and appliances (dishwasher, wall oven, gas cooktop, rangehood). Entertainers will be in their element when they lay eyes on the outdoor entertaining zone. The sheltered deck creates a wealth of space for hosting loved ones, while the sun-drenched spa zone is an absolute treat!
Parents will adore the Master Bedroom, which features two walk-in robes and a new en suite. Boasting an open shower and dual vanity with clean-lined cabinetry, this en suite exudes sleek and contemporary style. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the main bathroom and separate toilet, while the study offers versatility as a 4th Bedroom. The laundry boasts ample storage. Ducted heating, a split-system air conditioner and ceiling fans provide comfort.
The expansive grounds create a private wonderland for children and adults alike. Nestled amongst the gums, the rustic fire pit area is perfect for chilly winter nights. The double lock-up garage provides secure parking, while the work shed accommodates five vehicles and the additional workshop measures 3.5 x 5.4m making this property an ideal choice for tradies and hobby farmers. A powered concrete slab offers dedicated parking for a caravan.
With something to impress every family member, youll need to act swiftly to secure this rare lifestyle opportunity! Inspect ASAP!
Insights: 248-256 Bawtree Road, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 1996.

Description:
Single Level Living and Low Maintenance Lifestyle
You'll Love:
The free flowing floorplan- this light-filled home is situated in an elevated position offering an outlook across Spring Creek and close proximity to walking tracks and schools.
Upon entry, the abundance of natural light that leads you to an open plan living area that adjoins a second sitting room and a north-facing undercover alfresco perfect for all season dining
The kitchen has sleek vinyl-wrap cupboards, feature splashback, built-in-pantry and a caesarstone benchtop that overlooks the separate meals area
Plus:
At the front of the home, a generous master bedroom suite has plantation shutters, walk-in-robe and ensuite
Three additional bedrooms all have built-in-robes and is serviced by a central bathroom and separate toilet
Also featuring central heating and evaporative cooling, extra height in the double garage with extensive shelving and internal access, water-tank and a decking at the front of the home to sit and take in the sunset and views

Description:
Move in, Relax and Enjoy Easy Living
Youll love:
This quality, two-storey townhouse built by Mirvac offers easy living in a safe and friendly community and is an ideal lock and leave permanent or holiday home.
Freshly painted and with ducted heating throughout, the light filled ground floor features high ceilings and relaxed & open living spaces with a modern & well-equipped kitchen at its heart.
A large, private courtyard making the most of its northerly aspect is also located off one of the living areas complete with rear access to a single remote garage plus an extra car space.
Upstairs, the master suite boasts a leafy outlook with walk-through robes and a spacious en-suite with double basins.
Plus:
There is also an additional bedroom with BIRs located next to the second bathroom, more great storage and a cleverly concealed European laundry upstairs.
Downstairs features a powder room and generous under stairs storage too; plus it has a great double height entrance that allows even more natural light to pour in.
Located a lovely (and level!) eight-minute stroll from the beach, youll also love having access to the nearby swimming pool, gym, restaurant and golfing facilities at Peppers The Sands Resort.
With the low maintenance exterior and updated interior offering uncomplicated living and a resort-like feel, this home is a perfect choice for downsizers and busy professionals alike.
Insights: First listed on 21 September, this house has been on Domain for 29 days (last updated on 21 September). It was last sold in 2008 and 10 other 2 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
Spacious Family home in a location youll love!
Situated in a quiet court, nestled amongst quality properties is this deceptively spacious home that has been designed for large scale family living.
Set on a substantial 850sqm (approx) North/ West allotment, the home offers spacious proportions both inside and out. Comprising 3 zoned living areas including a large rumpus room complete offers direct access out to an undercover pergola and rear yard providing a safe and secure environment for children and pets to play.
The informal living and meals area is overseen by a well-appointed central kitchen, featuring quality stainless steel appliances. Sliding glass doors create a seamless indoor/ outdoor transition between the main living area and the alfresco dining, complete with a built-in outdoor kitchen.
The master bedroom features a walk-in robe and ensuite, a further 3 bedrooms all with walk-in robes and ceiling fans are positioned at the rear of the home and are serviced by a main family bathroom. The versatile 5th bedroom or study also features built in robes. Extras include, central heating, 2 x reverse cycle air conditioning, security system, ducted vacuum, water tank, remote double garage.
Additional features include solar panels, brand new carpets throughout, 2.5 renovated bathrooms, established fruit trees, garden shed and an abundance of storage throughout the home.
The home is conveniently situated just a couple of minutes to the Waurn Ponds shopping complex, Leisure Link recreational facilities, schools, Deakin Uni, Epworth, public transport and easy access to the Ring Road bypass.
Give your growing family the space and lifestyle they have always dreamt of.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Immaculate family home in a sought-after location!
Set in the highly sought-after location of Meadowvale drive, this property presents a terrific opportunity for first homebuyers and families alike!
From the moment you step inside, you'll love the welcoming ambience that this home exudes. The front lounge creates a wealth of space for relaxation, while the open plan living/dining/kitchen zone creates the lively hub of the home. The kitchen will delight with a built-in pantry, dishwasher, and gas cooktop and wall oven. The outdoor entertaining area sets the scene for year-round entertaining.
Overlooking the front garden, the Master Bedroom boasts Jack and Jill style wardrobes and en suite. Three additional bedrooms with built-in robes are tucked away in a separate wing, along with the main bathroom, separate toilet, and laundry with ample storage.
- Ducted heating and a S/S air-conditioner
- Double Remote lock-up garage
- Spacious back-garden with established fruit trees
Located in a family-friendly pocket of Grovedale, this location will leave you wanting nothing. Public transport is footsteps from your front door, while a short stroll will find you at the Waurn Ponds Creek walking trails. Greenville Kindergarten and Mandama P.S are moments away, while a variety of sporting grounds will keep the whole family entertained. Both the Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Ring Road and Surf Coast Highway are within easy reach, leaving you spoilt for choice with shopping and dining options.
With so much to offer, you'll need to act swiftly to secure this fantastic family abode! Enquire today!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Address: 31 Great Ocean Road Jan Juc VIC 3228
Description:
Renovated home with a cool backyard studio!
Youll love:
This classic Jan Juc beach home has undergone extensive renovations and includes all the creature comforts you could possibly want, with a stylishly enhanced coastal feel throughout.
Spinning yarns around the fire & on the elevated sun deck in the huge backyard which also features a stunning Flame tree that provides welcome shade for those hot summer days.
The open plan kitchen/living area flows onto the back deck & includes a quality stone benchtop, polished timber floors, stylish black tapware, a cosy gas fireplace, plantation shutters & more.
Plus:
3 well-appointed bedrooms are also located in the main abode: each with their own generous BIRs, soft carpet & stylish ceiling fan too!
The central bathroom is bright, light & airy plus it features a large bathtub thats separate and adjoins the laundry with additional storage included too.
Theres also high-grade acoustic insulation throughout, louvre windows at the front to promote excellent cross-ventilation & cooling during warmer months, plus 2 separate remote garages.
Only a leisurely stroll down the hill to Torquay & Jan Jucs surf beaches, Spring Creek Reserve, the RACV Resort, Bell St shops & more this exciting opportunity is definitely one to inspect!
Insights: First listed on 12 October, this house has been on Domain for 8 days. It was last sold in 2005 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Jan Juc have recently been sold.

Description:
Rare Land in Grandview
Grandview Parade, where vacant land is nearly unheard of! Set in an exceptional pocket of central Barwon Heads, this block is surrounded by established homes and is moments walk from the river, beach and shopping and dining on trendy Hitchcock Avenue.
-326sqm approx with a 11.69m approx frontage and 27.9m approx. depth
-Walk to the Village Park with many sporting facilities and clubs
-Enjoy the wineries and abundant local produce around The Bellarine Peninsula
-Close to picturesque swimming spots and world renowned surf breaks
-Magical fishing and sailing spots on your doorstep
A truly special opportunity to secure land in one of the Bellarine's most tightly held locales. Hurry to inspect. This one wont linger!

Description:
Timeless Malishev family home.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Julia Warren on 0432 182 271.
This seamless Malishev home is awaiting its lucky new owner.
Located just minutes to all of Highton and Waurn Ponds' finest amenities this home ticks all the boxes of convenience and livability.
Beyond the handsome façade you will be greeted by open light filled living spaces, with three living zones and a central family size kitchen. The main bedroom/master retreat is tucked away at the rear of the home with walk in robe, ensuite and doors out to the spacious gardens. Here you will also find the two further bedrooms, large light filled laundry and central family bathroom.
Stepping outside into the north sunshine you will land in the entertainer's dream, with endless undercover entertaining area and open spacious lawns & garden perfect for the kids, pets or anyone who enjoys a sense of space and privacy.
Key features:
-Malishev ex display home
-Spacious 720m2 approx. north facing block
-Cooling - ducted evaporated
-Heating 2x gas wall furnaces
-Solar panels, 5kw (2 years old)
-Electrolux induction cooking
-Smeg double oven
-Ceiling fans
-Drive through garage
-Walking distance to Waurn Ponds shopping & Porter Ave shops
-Bellaire Primary school zoned
-Within minutes to Christian College & Highton Primary School
-Minutes to Epworth Hospital & Deakin University
-Close to Augustine playground & reserve
-Flexible floor plan with multiple living zones
